en:
Join the hundreds of researchers from around
           the world who are part of the Open Specy community by
           analyzing, sharing, processing, and identifying
           their Raman and IR spectra. These services are free and open source thanks to our partners:
sw:
Jiunge na mamia ya watafiti kutoka pande zote
           ulimwengu ambao ni sehemu ya jamii ya Open Specy by
           kuchambua, kushiriki, kuchakata na kutambua
           Raman yao na IR spectra. Huduma hizi ni za bure na huria, shukrani kwa washirika wetu:

en:
In Brief: To use the tool upload a csv, asp, jdx, spc, or spa file to the upload file tab.
                                  If csv, one column should be named 'wavenumber' (in units of 1/cm) and another named 'intensity'.
                                  You can smooth your data using an SG filter, baseline correct your data using the polynomial order of iModPolyFit, and restrict the wavelength range for the match.
                                  The result will be compared to an internal Raman or FTIR spectra library. The strongest 1000 matches along with your
                                  uploaded or processed data will be presented in an interactive plot and table. For more details click the button below
                                  or watch the detailed instructional video.
sw:
Kwa ufupi: Ili kutumia zana pakia faili ya csv, asp, jdx, spc, au spa kwenye kichupo cha faili ya kupakia.
                                  Ikiwa csv, safu wima moja inapaswa kutajwa 'nambari ya wimbi' (katika vitengo vya 1/cm) na nyingine iitwe 'kiwango'.
                                  Unaweza kulainisha data yako kwa kutumia kichujio cha SG, kusahihisha data yako kwa kutumia mpangilio wa polinomia wa iModPolyFit, na uzuie urefu wa wimbi kwa mechi.
                                  Matokeo yatalinganishwa na maktaba ya ndani ya Raman au FTIR. Mechi kali zaidi 1000 pamoja na yako
                                  data iliyopakiwa au kuchakatwa itawasilishwa katika njama na jedwali shirikishi. Kwa maelezo zaidi bofya kitufe hapa chini
                                  au tazama video ya maelekezo ya kina.
Utaratibu wa Uendeshaji wa Kina wa Kawaida

en:
Reference spectra was sourced from open access resources
           online, peer reviewed publications, and corporate donations. In the future
           spectra that is uploaded to the tool will be incorporated to the reference
           library to make it even better.
sw:
Marejeleo ya marejeleo yalitolewa kutoka kwa rasilimali huria za ufikiaji
           mtandaoni, machapisho yaliyokaguliwa na wenzi, na michango ya shirika. Katika siku za usoni
           spectra ambayo imepakiwa kwenye zana itajumuishwa kwenye marejeleo
           maktaba ili kuifanya iwe bora zaidi.
Metadata ya Maktaba ya Marejeleo ya Raman
Metadata ya Maktaba ya Marejeleo ya FTIR

en:
To share spectra upload a file to the upload file tab. If you selected Share a copy of your spectra will be sent to the Community
           Data Warehouse on Open Science Framework. To add additional metadata, 
           fill in the avaliable metadata fields and click -Share Data-. The 
           spectra file that you uploaded along with your responses will be copied 
           to the a -With Metadata- subfolder at the link below. All shared data holds 
           a Creative Commons Attribution License 4.0.
sw:
Ili kushiriki mwonekano pakia faili kwenye kichupo cha faili ya kupakia. Ukichagua Shiriki nakala ya mwonekano wako itatumwa kwa Jumuiya
           Ghala la Data kwenye Mfumo wa Sayansi Huria. Ili kuongeza metadata ya ziada,
           jaza sehemu za metadata zinazopatikana na ubofye -Shiriki Data-. The
           faili ya spectra uliyopakia pamoja na majibu yako itanakiliwa
           kwa folda ya -Na Metadata- kwenye kiungo kilicho hapa chini. Data zote zilizoshirikiwa zimehifadhiwa
           Leseni ya Maelezo ya Creative Commons 4.0.

en:
All parameters in this tool are tested to validate that 
           the tool is functioning as best as possible and determine the best default 
           parameters to use. Our current validation proceedure includes correcting 
           duplicated entries in the reference libraries, checking for spectra in 
           metadata that isn't in the spectral library, and ensuring the the default 
           parameters provide over 80% accuracy in the first match.
sw:
Vigezo vyote kwenye chombo hiki vinajaribiwa ili kuthibitisha hilo
           chombo kinafanya kazi vizuri iwezekanavyo na kuamua chaguo-msingi bora
           vigezo vya kutumia. Utaratibu wetu wa sasa wa uthibitishaji ni pamoja na kusahihisha
           maingizo yaliyorudiwa katika maktaba za marejeleo, kuangalia kwa spectra ndani
           metadata ambayo haiko kwenye maktaba ya maonyesho, na kuhakikisha chaguo-msingi
           vigezo kutoa zaidi ya 80% usahihi katika mechi ya kwanza.

en: Updates, Feature Requests, and Bug Reports
sw: Masasisho, Maombi ya Kipengele, na Ripoti za Hitilafu

en: We keep track of all updates using version control on our code. Features can be requested and bug reported on GitHub.
sw: Tunafuatilia masasisho yote kwa kutumia udhibiti wa matoleo kwenye msimbo wetu. Vipengele vinaweza kuombwa na mdudu kuripotiwa kwenye GitHub.

en: Follow us on Twitter @OpenSpecy. E-mail wincowger@gmail.com to be added to the mailing list.
sw: Tufuate kwenye Twitter @OpenSpecy. Barua pepe wincowger@gmail.com ili kuongezwa kwenye orodha ya wanaopokea barua pepe.

en: Free FTIR Software: siMPle microplastic IR spectral identification software
sw: Programu ya Bure ya FTIR: programu rahisi ya utambulisho wa spectral ya microplastic ya IR

en: Free Spectroscopy Learning Academy from ThermoFisher
sw: Chuo cha Kujifunza cha Bure cha Spectroscopy kutoka ThermoFisher

en: Free Optical Microscopy Learning Resource from Florida State University
sw: Nyenzo ya Kujifunza ya Hadubini ya Macho bila Malipo kutoka Chuo Kikuu cha Jimbo la Florida

en: Free desktop application for spectral analysis and links to reference databases.
sw: Programu ya bure ya eneo-kazi kwa uchanganuzi wa taswira na viungo vya hifadhidata za kumbukumbu.

en:
If you like, we share your uploaded spectra and settings with the spectroscopy community.
           By default, all data will be licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0).
           Uploaded spectra will appear here: https://osf.io/rjg3c
sw:
Ukipenda, tunashiriki mwonekano na mipangilio yako iliyopakiwa na jumuiya ya taswira.
           Kwa chaguomsingi, data yote itapewa leseni chini ya Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International (CC BY-NC 4.0).
           Muonekano uliopakiwa utaonekana hapa: https://osf.io/rjg3c

en:
Upload Raman or FTIR spectrum files as a csv, jdx, spc, or spa. A csv file is preferred. If a csv, the file must contain one column labeled 'wavenumber' in units of (1/cm) and another column labeled 'intensity' in absorbance units.
            If jdx, spc, spa, or 0 the file should be a single absorbance spectrum with wavenumber in (1/cm). These files will not always work perfectly because they are tricky to read so double check them in another software.
            Hit the 'Test Data' button to download a sample Raman spectrum.
sw:
Pakia faili za wigo za Raman au FTIR kama csv, jdx, spc, au spa. Faili ya csv inapendekezwa. Ikiwa csv, faili lazima iwe na safu wima moja iliyoandikwa 'nambari ya wimbi' katika vitengo vya (1/cm) na safu wima nyingine iliyoandikwa 'kiwango' katika vitengo vya kunyonya.
            Ikiwa jdx, spc, spa, au 0 faili inapaswa kuwa wigo mmoja wa kunyonya na nambari ya wimbi katika (1/cm). Faili hizi hazitafanya kazi kikamilifu kila wakati kwa sababu ni gumu kusoma kwa hivyo ziangalie mara mbili kwenye programu nyingine.
            Gonga kitufe cha 'Data ya Kujaribu' ili kupakua sampuli ya wigo wa Raman.

en:
If the uploaded spectrum is not in absorbance units, 
           use this input to specify the units to convert from.Open Specy can 
           adjust reflectance or transmittance spectra to Absorbance units using 
           this drop down in the upload file tab. All of the preceding tabs 
           assume that the data is in absorbance units so you should make the 
           correction before continuing if needed. The transmittance adjustment 
           uses the log10(1/T) calculation which does not correct for system 
           and particle characteristics. The reflectance adjustment uses the 
           Kubelka-Munk equation (1-R)2/(2*R). We assume that the reflectance 
           is formatted as a percent from 1-100 and first correct the intensity by dividing by 100
           so that it fits the form expected by the equation.
           If none is selected, Open Specy assumes that the uploaded data is 
           an absorbance spectrum.
sw:
Ikiwa wigo uliopakiwa hauko katika vitengo vya kunyonya,
           tumia ingizo hili kubainisha vitengo vya kubadilisha kutoka.Open Specy can
           rekebisha uakisi au mwonekano wa upitishaji kwa vitengo vya Absorbance kwa kutumia
           kunjuzi hii katika kichupo cha faili ya upakiaji. Vichupo vyote vilivyotangulia
           fikiria kuwa data iko katika vitengo vya kunyonya kwa hivyo unapaswa kutengeneza
           marekebisho kabla ya kuendelea kama inahitajika. Marekebisho ya upitishaji
           hutumia hesabu ya log10(1/T) ambayo si sahihi kwa mfumo
           na sifa za chembe. Marekebisho ya uakisi hutumia
           Mlinganyo wa Kubelka-Munk (1-R)2/(2*R). Tunadhania kuwa tafakari
           imeumbizwa kama asilimia kutoka 1-100 na kwanza kurekebisha ukubwa kwa kugawanya na 100.
           ili ilingane na fomu inayotarajiwa na mlinganyo.
           Ikiwa hakuna iliyochaguliwa, Open Specy inadhania kuwa data iliyopakiwa ni
           wigo wa kunyonya.

en: This is a sample spectrum that can be uploaded to the tool for testing it out and understanding how the csv files should be formatted.
sw: Huu ni sampuli ya wigo inayoweza kupakiwa kwa zana ya kuijaribu na kuelewa jinsi faili za csv zinapaswa kuumbizwa.

en:
We share any uploaded spectra and metadata with the spectroscopy community if you fill out the metadata here and select share.
           Uploaded spectra and metadata will appear here: https://osf.io/rjg3c
sw:
Tunashiriki mwonekano na metadata yoyote iliyopakiwa na jumuiya ya spectroscopy ikiwa utajaza metadata hapa na kuchagua kushiriki.
           Muonekano na metadata iliyopakiwa itaonekana hapa: https://osf.io/rjg3c

en: Upload some data to get started...
sw: Pakia baadhi ya data ili kuanza...

en: Smooth, Baseline Correct, and Download Processed Spectra
sw: Laini, Sahihi ya Msingi, na Pakua Spectra Iliyochakatwa

en: Some users may wish to save a copy of their processed spectrum. This button downloads the processed spectrum as a csv file.
sw: Watumiaji wengine wanaweza kutaka kuhifadhi nakala ya wigo wao uliochakatwa. Kitufe hiki hupakua wigo uliochakatwa kama faili ya csv.

en: This smoother can enhance the signal to noise ratio of the data and uses a Savitzky-Golay filter with 12 running data points and the polynomial specified.
sw: Ulaini huu unaweza kuongeza uwiano wa mawimbi na kelele wa data na hutumia kichujio cha Savitzky-Golay chenye pointi 12 za data zinazoendeshwa na polynomial iliyobainishwa.

en: This baseline correction routine has two options for baseline correction, 1) the polynomial imodpolyfit procedure to itteratively find the baseline of the spectrum using a polynomial fit to the entire region of the spectra. 2) manual lines can be drawn using the line tool on the plot and the correct button will use the lines to subtract the baseline.
sw: Ratiba hii ya kusahihisha ya msingi ina chaguo mbili za urekebishaji wa msingi, 1) utaratibu wa polynomial imodpolyfit ili kupata kwa usawa msingi wa wigo kwa kutumia upataji wa polinomia kwa eneo zima la spectra. 2) mistari ya mwongozo inaweza kuchorwa kwa kutumia zana ya mstari kwenye njama na kitufe sahihi kitatumia mistari kutoa msingi.

en: Restricting the spectral range can remove regions of spectrum where no peaks exist and improve matching
sw: Kuzuia mfululizo wa spectral kunaweza kuondoa maeneo ya wigo ambapo hakuna vilele vilivyopo na kuboresha ulinganishaji
Kiwango cha Chini cha Masafa ya Tahadhari

en: Identify Spectrum Using the Reference Library
sw: Tambua Spectrum Kwa Kutumia Maktaba ya Marejeleo

en: This selection will determine whether the FTIR or Raman matching library is used. Choose the spectrum type that was uploaded.
sw: Uteuzi huu utaamua ikiwa maktaba ya FTIR au Raman inayolingana inatumika. Chagua aina ya wigo iliyopakiwa.

en: This selection will determine whether the uploaded (not processed) spectrum or the spectrum processed using the processing tab is used in the spectrum match.
sw: Uteuzi huu utabainisha ikiwa wigo uliopakiwa (haujachakatwa) au wigo uliochakatwa kwa kutumia kichupo cha kuchakata unatumika katika ulinganifu wa masafa.

en: This selection will determine whether the library you are matching to consists of the full spectrum or only spectrum peaks.
sw: Uteuzi huu utabainisha ikiwa maktaba unayolinganisha nayo inajumuisha wigo kamili au vilele vya wigo pekee.

en: Help us reach our goal of revolutionizing spectroscopy.
sw: Tusaidie kufikia lengo letu la kuleta mapinduzi ya tasnia.
Nunua Kutoka kwa Duka la Swag

en: A paid team that is pushing Open Specy closer to the ultimate goal of 100% accurate spectral identification and deep spectral diagnostics with a single click
sw: Timu inayolipwa ambayo inasukuma Open Specy karibu na lengo kuu la utambuzi sahihi wa 100% wa picha na uchunguzi wa kina kwa mbofyo mmoja.

en: A single paid staff person working to update and build the community and the tool
sw: Mfanyikazi mmoja anayelipwa anayefanya kazi kusasisha na kujenga jumuiya na zana

en: Maintenance costs and minor ad-hoc updates and bug fixes
sw: Gharama za matengenezo na masasisho madogo ya ad-hoc na marekebisho ya hitilafu

en: Keeping the app online and essential maintenance
sw: Kuweka programu mtandaoni na matengenezo muhimu

en: Thank you for sharing your data!
Your data will soon be available at https://osf.io/stmv4/
sw: Data yako itapatikana hivi karibuni kwenye https://osf.io/stmv4/

en:
Uploaded data type is not currently supported; please
                      check tooltips and 'About' tab for details.
sw:
Aina ya data iliyopakiwa haitumiki kwa sasa; tafadhali
                      angalia vidokezo vya zana na kichupo cha 'Kuhusu' kwa maelezo.
Kushiriki Spectrum kwa Maktaba ya Jumuiya

en:
If you uploaded a text/csv file, make sure that the 
           columns are numeric and named 'wavenumber' and 
           'intensity'.
sw:
Ikiwa ulipakia faili ya maandishi/csv, hakikisha kwamba faili ya
           safu wima ni nambari na zinaitwa 'wavenumber' na
           'kiwango'.
